verbs.description: [V: hank] hudson brewing co opens halfmoon taproom hank hudson brewing co is in a soft - opening period at the fairways of halfmoon golf course in halfmoon the founders and head brewers are darren van heusen and chris crounse who are both local teachers chris crounse halfmoon hank hudson brewing hank hudson brewing co brewing halfmoon golf course darren van heusen halfmoon taproom
